sama palathakama aabadhitha ranawiruwan wenuwen abhimansala suwa sahana madhyasthana sthapitha kirimata piyawara ganna bawada janadhipathiwaraya prakasha kaleya.eda wellamulliwayikkal waladi satana awasana wunama jathika kodiya daragena parata bahapu janathawa ada me ranawiruwan ekka thawama innawa kiya bohoma pahadiliwa janathawa atha leladena ee jathika kodiya dutuwama, ee gana apita aadambarayak hithena bawada janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha kiweya.senadhinayaka, janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage mahinda chinthana prathipaththi prakashanaye rakawarana niwasa sankalpaya yatathe deshaye samaya udesa thama diwi kapa kara purna aabadhitha thaththwayata pathwa sitina abhitha ranawiruwange punaruththapanaya, waidya prathikara, wiwekaya udesa abhimansala wadasatahana kriyawata nanwa atha.swabhawika sampathwalin ha jaiwa wiwidhathwayen yuth akkara 10 ka bhumi bhagayaka idikara athi kambaurupitiya abhimansala suwasahana madhyasthanaya sandaha rupiyal miliyana 240 k waya kara thibe.
